attributes.action: Allow the government to use NHS Covid testing kit to be used for travelling
attributes.additional_details:
It is very obvious, that over 400 companies have been created now on the back of testing for travel abroad and are charging extortionate amount for both PCR and Lateral flow test which are only costing a few pounds and sold over the pharmacy counters. 
Surely, this is limiting a very large amount of the Public to travel abroad and without a doubt will impact our economy. Furthermore, it is also creating a stronger gap between the rich and poor.
attributes.background: Make a law to approve NHS kit for travelling

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Allow international travel with a lateral flow test result
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582714
